product_name: New Balance Limited Edition NYC 990v3 Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Inspired by the electric Big Apple lifestyle, the New Balance Limited Edition NYC 990v3 Road-Running Shoes pack a style punch without sacrificing cushion and support for long-distance runs. ABZORB(R) midsoles provide stability while ENCAP(R) technology in the heels promotes a healthy gait. Dual-density collars use both a softer-density foam against the feet for cushioning and a firmer-density foam for support. Pigskin/mesh uppers are clean and crisp with colors that pop. Reflective detailing enhances your visibility. Blown rubber outsoles provide good traction. Closeout.
short_description: Inspired by the electric Big Apple lifestyle, the New Balance Limited Edition NYC 990v3 Road-Running Shoes pack a style punch without sacrificing cushion and support for long-distance runs.
